snippet.title: Battle Bay – Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Team up with friends and battle other players in real-time in an all new mobile multiplayer battle arena, Battle Bay – available now in the App Store and Google Play. Download here: http://rov.io/PlayBB_yt


A real-time multiplayer battle arena in your pocket. Choose a ship, slap some guns on it and take to the waves with your fleet of teammates to battle live opponents in five-on-five PvP contests of seafaring strategy and firepower. Smile and wave goodbye to your enemies!


BATTLE BAY FEATURES:
– Battle against teams of other players in real-time.
– Pilot one of 5 ships, each with their own specialty.
– Challenge opponents in 9 unique maps.
– Climb the leaderboards in two-week-long battle seasons.
– Navigate wavy battlefields to defeat your rivals.
– Train, upgrade, and fuse crew, ships and weapons.
– Join a guild to chat with your guild mates and earn perks.
– Fleet up with your friends and battle together.
– Download for free!

Visit the Battle Bay forum: https://forum.battlebay.net/
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/battlebayofficial/
